hero.name: Gonzalo Lobos
hero.title: Business Engineer Specializing in E-commerce and Web Development.
hero.subtitle: I turn strategies into digital experiences that drive growth.

about.title: About Me
about.imageAlt: Portrait of Gonzalo Lobos, E-commerce and Web Development Specialist
about.introduction: UAI Business Engineer passionate about connecting business and technology. With experience leading e-commerce initiatives for Nespresso, I focus on creating memorable user experiences that drive conversion and foster loyalty.
about.skills: My approach is data-driven, using Google Analytics to turn data into action and optimize the sales funnel. I complement my analytical vision with experience in front-end development to design, prototype, and collaborate effectively with technical teams, ensuring precise execution.
about.callToAction: I'm looking to connect with innovative teams to create exceptional digital products. If my profile resonates with you, let's talk.

items.title: Expansis - Digital Solutions
items.description: Development and consulting of custom digital solutions to boost online businesses, covering web development, digital marketing, and SEO strategies.

items.title: Lobos Mini Excavators
items.description: Website for a mini excavator rental company, focused on excavations and earthmoving in confined spaces in the Aconcagua Valley.

items.title: My Personal Portfolio
items.description: Design and development of my own professional portfolio website. Built from scratch with React and Tailwind CSS, and deployed with Firebase.

caseStudies.title: Case Studies
caseStudies.subtitle: A selection of my most recent achievements and projects.

items.title: Strategic Digital Campaign Management
items.problem: Need to run multiple simultaneous campaigns on web and app to boost sales.
items.objective: Orchestrate over 30 annual campaigns with a consistent user experience.
actions: Planning and execution of an annual campaign calendar.
Coordination with design, development, and marketing teams.
results: Significant sales impact, moving over 8.4 million units.
Improved purchase frequency and user interaction.

items.title: SEO Order Share Growth
items.problem: The organic channel represented only 9% of orders, showing a growth opportunity.
items.objective: Increase the share of organic orders from 9% to 13% in the first half of 2025.
actions: Optimization of main and long-tail keywords.
Implementation of FAQ sections on product pages.
Use of structured data (Schema) to improve visibility.
results: 4% increase in the share of organic orders (from 9% to 13%).

items.title: Pickup Channel Optimization
items.problem: Improve the omnichannel experience and reduce the operational load on customer service.
items.objective: Strengthen the in-store pickup system and communicate self-service tools.
actions: I optimized the purchase flow for the pickup modality.
Communication was improved to invite customers to the boutique experience.
Transactional emails were optimized to expedite pickup.
Boutique team training to enhance the customer experience.
results: 15% increase in orders with the pickup modality.

responsibilities: Lead the e-commerce strategy for Nespresso.com.
Monitor the purchase process on Nespresso.cl.
Develop online campaigns like Cyber Day and Black Friday.
Improve the SEO positioning of the website.

past.title: Training Development Manager
responsibilities: Coordination of training in the health and education sectors.

past.title: Front-End Developer
responsibilities: Coordination with clients to create custom Mockups and Wireframes for website development.

past.title: Photography Technician
responsibilities: Assistance in photographic and audiovisual productions for major brands.
Coordination of casting for photographic and audiovisual projects.

past.title: Marketing Product Management
responsibilities: Coordination for the implementation of graphic materials in La Tercera, La Hora, Motores, and Paula.
Coordination with the design team for graphic materials for La Tercera newspaper's subscription campaigns.
Coordination with the layout team for the implementation of graphics in the newspaper on scheduled dates.
Drafting contracts with various suppliers for subscription-related products.
Monitoring income and expenses for La Tercera's subscription area.

strategy.title: E-commerce Strategy
strategy.description: Roadmap definition, P&L management, and leadership of high-impact campaigns (Cyber Day, Black Friday).

strategy.title: Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO)
strategy.description: Sales funnel analysis, A/B testing, and continuous improvement of user experience (UX/UI).

strategy.title: Digital Marketing & SEO
strategy.description: Organic positioning strategies, SEM, and marketing automation for customer loyalty (CRM).

strategy.title: Digital Project Management
strategy.description: Coordination of multidisciplinary teams for the execution of technological and commercial projects.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: If you are interested in collaborating or have any questions, feel free to contact me. I'm open to new opportunities!
